opening.script: Hi! I'm calling from AT&T. We have some great new offers in your area. Do you have a moment to talk?

service_type.script: Great! Are you currently interested in Internet, TV, or Mobile services?

age_check.script: Perfect! Are you or anyone in your household 55 or older? We have special discounts for seniors.

senior_offer.script: Excellent! You qualify for our senior discount. I'd love to show you these exclusive deals in person. Can I book you for a quick visit to our store?

standard_offer.script: Great! We have some fantastic bundles available. I can walk you through all the options at our store. Would you like to schedule a quick visit?

more_info_senior.script: With our senior discount, you can save up to $30/month on unlimited plans. Plus, we waive activation fees. Can I get you scheduled for a store visit this week?

more_info_standard.script: Our bundles include fiber internet up to 5 Gig speeds, premium TV channels, and unlimited mobile data. Let's discuss the best fit for you at our store. Can I book you in?

close_success.script: Perfect! I'll get you scheduled. Our team will reach out within 24 hours to confirm your appointment. Thank you for choosing AT&T!

callback_offer.script: No problem! Can I call you back at a better time? We'd love to help you save on your services.

close_callback.script: Great! We'll follow up with you soon. Have a wonderful day!

polite_close.script: I understand. If you change your mind, we're here to help. Have a great day!
